name: Christmas Cats
description:
In this game there are 4 unique playable Christmas Cats, one to choose from for each player in this 4 player split screen adventure.

King Rat has kidnapped Santa! So now its up to the Christmas Cats to make sure those presents still get delivered!

As you glide down the hills on your magical sled as a Christmas Cat delivering presents to all the nearby houses, you'll also have to deal with King Rat and his minions.
